description:
**Fix Overview**:

To resolve the SQLite vulnerability (CVE-2022-35737) which allows an array-bounds overflow that can lead to remote code execution:

1. Download and install the KB5034122 update from the Microsoft Update Catalog.
2. Ensure your system meets the build requirement before applying the update.
3. Restart your system after the installation to apply the changes effectively.

**Details**:
This update addresses the vulnerability by providing an updated version of the SQLite library. For products running Windows 10 Version 22H2, ensure you have build 10.0.19045.3930 or later for successful implementation.
Download the update package from here: [KB5034122](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034122).

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure the system is compatible with the specified builds.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
